td.content: s:a 24 yr old male presents with 2 years history of mild vision deterioration, especially in the dark. pt also reports increased frequency of mild trouble seeing in foggy or rainy weather, mild constriction in eye field, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. Patient does not smoke denies any alcohol use o:Height 163 cm, Weight 66.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
